mission-tax-decoupling-spec.instruction: Draft a comprehensive technical specification for Decoupling Taxation (TD-176) and implementing a Saga-like Atomic Settlement (TD-175). Objectives: 1. Extract all tax calculation/recording logic from TransactionProcessor and Government. 2. Design a new TaxationSystem module in modules/government/taxation/. 3. Define the interface for 'TaxIntents' that TransactionProcessor will request. 4. Refactor SettlementSystem to support atomic multi-credit transfers (1 Debit -> N Credits) with robust rollback. 5. Consult ARCH_TRANSACTIONS.md to ensure zero-sum integrity and precision rules are respected.
